alert.note: Alert for Accomack (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 7:48PM EDT until May 16 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Accomack County in southeastern Virginia... * Until 830 PM EDT. * At 748 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lawsonia, or 19 miles southwest of Pocomoke City, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Parksley around 810 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Temperanceville, Nelsonia, Hallwood, Modest Town, Mappsville, Clam, Guilford, Bloxom, Assawoman and Atlantic. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.
